nodes.text: Ka'hadith Jinwa'a was a female Mirialan underboss of the Starbolts gang operating in the Free Zone, a black market on Asylum, a space station in Wild Space functioning as a shadowport. Armed with a blaster pistol, Jinwa'a fought in the gang war between the Blast Crew and Starbolts in 3631 BBY. She was killed by the Commander and HK-55 outside of the hideout of the crime lord Oggo.
Ka'hadith Jinwa'a appears in Chapter VI: Asylum of Knights of the Fallen Empire, a 2015 digital expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
